definition.name: Update Ghost Posts
definition.description: Schedule updates to your Ghost posts
definition.author: TryGhost

inputs.name: tag
inputs.description: The tag to lookup to find posts to update e.g. `hash-early-access`

inputs.name: field
inputs.description: The post field that you want to update e.g. `visibility` or `featured`

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: The new value for the field e.g. `public` or `false`

inputs.name: days
inputs.description: Number of days after the post was published to update the post
